---
title: 381 - Don't judge what is inside from what is outside
author: Mataji Devaki Ma
date: "11/01/2020"
categories: [Conversations, Sannidhi street]
---
Ma narrates the tale of when Sri Ramanujachari bought a green mango to Bhagavan He asked people around "Is this fruit ripe?" Later He went on to say "Don't judge what is inside from what is outside". Ma also talks about Bhagavan mentioning Tulsidas talking about He doesn't care about what people think of him, he only wants to be a good instrument at the hands of Bhawan Rama. 
 
Please follow the [link](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PryU94ou3Sg) for the satsang in youtube.
